name: Druid's Stick Insurance co. (An Adventure with Doughnuts)
name_original: Druid's Stick Insurance co. (An Adventure with Doughnuts)
description:
Bored at work, you decide to ask your boss for a break but she's nowhere to be found.

Will you find your boss or be consumed by your insatiable appetite for doughnuts?
